divs: sighting detailsobject observed when i awoke in the middle of night for the toilet, then went into consevatory noticed clock was 2.10am location as above kilmarnock ayrshire, conditins very clear calm night sky.. going throuh kitchen prior to entring conservatory...main large orange\white diamond hovering moving slighty left right 4 off very bright orange\white diamond lights protruding from north south east west direction joining up to main diamond once formed full diamond & attached lights hovered for a minute then accelarated almost instantley off into horizon.
Summary: ORANGE/WHITE DIAMOND 4 OFF BRIGHTORANGE /WHITE DIAMOND LIGHTS PROTRUDING FROM NSEW DIRECTION JOINING UP TO MAIN DIAMOND
